LanguageData.LavaField.label: lava field
LanguageData.LavaField.description: Barren wastes burned clean by volcanic heat. Periodic lava eruptions can burn people and buildings, but also enrich the soil with mineral deposits.
LanguageData.LavaField.settleWarning: This area has high volcanic activity. It is threatened by clouds of volcanic ash, as well as periodic lava eruptions.
